      • getClosestBirds

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getClosestBirds(java.util.List<Question> questions,
                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> answers,
                                                         java.lang.Integer wrongBirdID)
        Get a list of at most 5 birds closest in attributes to the wrong bird
        Parameters:
        questions - List of Questions Asked
        answers - List of Answers to the Questions Asked
        wrongBirdID - ID of the Bird which has been Identified as Incorrect by the User
        Returns:
        List of at most 5 birdIDs matching closest to the bird
